name: Shivanshi
greetingText: I don't know if anyone has told this to you, you have a really sweet voice!
wishText: May the god always be with you and help you in your exams! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
